scripts.gcc-script: cd ref && gcc -shared -o libkyber.so -fPIC kyber_api.c kem.c cbd.c fips202.c indcpa.c ntt.c poly.c polyvec.c randombytes.c reduce.c symmetric-shake.c verify.c && node script.js && cd ..
scripts.clean-files: cd ref && rm -rf shared_secret_enc.bin shared_secret_dec.bin ciphertext.bin public_key.bin secret_key.bin pk_hex.txt sk_hex.txt ss_hex.txt ss_hex_dec.txt kyber768-data.csv && cd ..
